title: Regulation :- For the lands situated within 5 km
clause_text: Regulation :- For the lands situated within 5 km. distance from the boundaries of wildlife sanctuaries and national parks, if the land owner applies for development permission, for Development of eco-tourism, nature tourism, adventure tourism, same may be allowed; provided the land under consideration has minimum area of one hector in contiguous manner. Agriculture, Farming, development of wild animal shelters, plantation and allied uses.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
